good shooting range. lots of aggressively moving targets also some special ones that are very annoying but it's possible to get used to them and wreck them really good.
This game is great i definitely recommend because of pure fun you can have with buddies or even by yourself at times

i absolutely love this game! long time fan 10/10 amazed to this day!!!

This is one of the best games for people that like old and good graphic games at the same time. sometimes it can have glitches or fps drop (specially for me bc i use a bad pc) but overall one of the best games i ever played

La nostalgia vende y me hizo comprar el juego

muy buen juego a pesar de los años sigue siendo de mis favoritos

Diversão co-op garantida há anos! Nunca fica ruim essa simples premissa... grupo de sobreviventes contra zumbis com mecânicas simples e veloz. Jogos assim, sem florear e inventar demais, atravessam gerações sem perder o gosto. Muito recomendado!
###############
Co-op fun guaranteed for years! This simple premise never gets bad... group of survivors against zombies with simple and fast mechanics. Games like this, without flourishing and inventing too much, cross generations without losing their taste. Highly recommended!
